Author: TheManyArchetypes
Text: I feel you. My family is all on the heavier side.  I lost both my parents to cancers, and a lot of my aunts and uncles have also recently passed away pretty young. Some of them were actually active and healthy, but my parents were not, and I can't help but think *what if* they had been?   So I have a lot of health anxiety, and restricting to not gain weight back is definitely a coping mechanism for that.
